Comment: ***Most*** CEOs don't support Trump though, broadly speaking. Musk is deepthroating Trump mostly because he's the worlds richest man with a "little man" complex who needs a way to be fulfilled in life, and owning the US govt is everybody's wet dream.  Tim Cook is supporting Trump because he knows he can get exempt from Tariffs which will give him a competitive edge in the market     But other than a small handful of CEOs that you're thinking of, a lot of CEOs don't support Trumps economic policy and most people who do support him have an alterior motive such as the CEOs mentioned above, or how Eric Adams supports Trump because he doesn't wanna go to jail.
